name: week
description:
From a date/time object, determines the week number within
 the year. An integer in the range 1-53; the ordinal of the
 week, within the year.

params.name: date
params.description: A date/time object in the range 100 AD-9999 AD.

params.name: calendar
params.description: CF2016u8+ Indicates whether the week starts on Sunday (gregorian) or Monday (iso)

coldfusion.notes: Member function is available in CF11+.

lucee.notes: Member function is available in Lucee4.5+.

examples.title: Week of a datetime object
